title: South Africa health minister says travel bans are 'unjustified,' as world reacts to new Covid variant
content:
1. South Africa health minister says travel bans are 'unjustified,' as world reacts to new Covid variant  CNBC
  2. EU, UK, Israel to halt air travel to southern Africa over new COVID-19 variant  Fox News
  3. New Covid-19 variant sparks global travel restrictions: Live updates  CNN
  4. Flights should be suspended over new variant: Ursula von der Leyen  Reuters
  5. Israel bars travel from most of Africa to curb new virus strain, ministers to meet  The Times of Israel
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
